title: Red Sox deal All-Star Devers to Giants in stunner
description: The Giants are sending Jordan Hicks, Kyle Harrison, outfield prospect James Tibbs and another prospect to the Red Sox for Rafael Devers.
author: Jeff Passan

title: Spaun captures first major title, wins U.S. Open
description: J.J. Spaun, 34, who started Sunday one stroke behind 54-hole leader Sam Burns, survived a terrible start and challenging elements to pull away from the pack and capture his first major title with a two-stroke win in the U.S. Open at Oakmont Country Club.
author: Mark Schlabach

title: Should Sam Burns have gotten relief at U.S. Open? Decision sparks controversy in final round
description: Should Sam Burns have gotten relief on the 15th hole during the final round of the 2025 U.S. Open? It's a question he's going to ask for a long time.

title: Reese's triple double and Van Lith's career-high 16 points push Sky past Sun 78-66
author: The Associated Press

title: Spaun holds off MacIntyre to win dramatic US Open
description: America's JJ Spaun beats Robert MacIntyre by two shots to win first major title on chaotic final day at the US Open

title: Norris 'made a fool' of himself in Piastri collision
description: Lando Norris says he "made a fool" of himself in colliding with McLaren team-mate Oscar Piastri in the Canadian Grand Prix.

title: Frank appointed Tottenham head coach
description: Tottenham have appointed Thomas Frank as their new head coach.

title: N Ireland seal World Cup of Darts glory with last-leg win over Wales
description: Northern Ireland claimed a historic victory at the 2025 BetVictor World Cup of Darts, defeating Wales 10-9 in a dramatic final in Frankfurt on Sunday.
